name: DBClash.com
description:
Did you ever played a character building game, or a Dragon Ball game? Well, DBClash is both of them... and more! Absolutely FREE, no P2W !

PLAY THE GAME

Create, train and teach your own Dragon Ball character - fight monsters and other players. Let's see step by step:

Choose a character Select a Dragon Ball legend from 15 characters.

Every character has a different starting skill and trait.

Don't worry, all of them can be built in thousand ways and trained to learn all sort of skills.

Register a character here. Train Travel across the world and train your character.

By training, your character will increase his/hers stats.

A character has 4 stats: Health, Defense, Strength and Energy.

The character's Power level is an average of these four stats. Learn skills Learn from 21 skills.

Every skill has 5 levels, and every level has an increasing amount of lessons to learn.

Skills can be offensive or defensive, strength or energy based, and each differs in cooldown, damage composition and much more.

Check the learnable skills list on every location. PVE and PVP battles Engage in PVE and PVP battles on every location.

The battle-system is a cooldown turn-based system, which means that both you and the enemy perform skills than waits for the skill's cooldown to end.

It's not just about strategy and character skills! It's about your own skills too! When executing a skill, you need to perform a reflex check by pressing keys as fast as you can - this is called a try check. The faster and more accurate you act, the more damage you inflict. AP system Grow big by using your AP wisely.

Almost every action you're character takes cost AP (action point).

You'll get 1 AP / hour, hence you need to plan smart for what will you use them.

Your character can store up to 72 AP at once, so you should visit him/her at least once per three days. Seasons A new year: a new season - and many gifts!

In every year's january prizes are released for all leaderboard rankings, following a full reset of the characters and leaderboards.

We respect new players and fair competition.

Noone will overgrow, Noone will pay-to-win! Veterans and newbies, poor and rich has the same chances in DBClash.com

Register!
